title: How to Crack the Paper
text: Each and every slide comes in the exam. Usually, you've to attempt 5/6 questions. Just go through the slides and that's it. Prof. VN Giri usually gives "A" grade whoever did decent in the exam. Attendance not such an issue. 50% is sufficient. Not at all a strict teacher.
